title: ISldWorks.GetLocalizedMenuName
description: Gets a localized menu name for the specified menu ID.

parameters.name: MenuId
parameters.description: Menu ID as defined in swMenuIdentifiers_e

returns: String containing the localized menu name
remarks:
The string returned allows the application to provide a correctly localized string representing the menu name that menus and menu items can be when added to in the SOLIDWORKS Design user interface.
This method should be called before
ISldWorks::AddMenu
,
ISldWorks::AddMenuItem3
,
IFrame::AddMenu
, or
IFrame::AddMenuItem2
.
